comment: Every smell and taste combines to give a great experience in your mouth.

Ah, muted but familiar rye nose, slightly herbal, MGP. Black tea and Pepsi on the palate, then a burst of dill that lingers. Smooth for the proof. Ends with charred wood and bitterness. Great on profile bottling. 9/2/19
Excellent example of mgp rye. Smooth for the proof
Light pleasant spice smell, leather, spice, orange, pleasant slow burn after
Great nose, light body but full finish. bit harsh for me
